title: How to write a descriptive essay with a picture - Quora

response.answer_text: My suggestion is: use figurative language! It helps the reader picture the description by comparing/categorizing it with something else. Use specific words depending on the feeling you want to portray. negative impression (brown): dirt, poop, rust positive impression (brown): almond, bronze, chocolate Example: [ ]=figurative language The princess wore an extravagant, blue ball gown. Her dress was huge and poofy, [as if it she wore a giant, ocean blue cloud.] She was covered in shiny jewelry, [lighting up the room.] Her hair was as [dark as charcoal], wrapped in a lovely bun. Her eyes were so big, [you could see the entire galaxy in them.] Anyone could hear her shiny heels click and clack. To top it all off, her tiara was so bright and big, [the ballroom didn’t need a chandelier.]
